ygData.msgSnippet: I think it s mainly a precaution for the creators/maintainers of this mailing list. They are looking out for us. I beleive I am right in assuming that we can
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 16
Message-ID: <17248.16.48.959279670@...>
Date: Sun, 14 Feb 1999 19:28:48 -0500
From: maxim@...)
Subject: Re: ???

I think it's mainly a precaution for the creators/maintainers of this
mailing list. They are looking out for us. I beleive I am right in assuming
that we can send levels to each other so long as we do not send them over
THIS list. In other words I have to send them straight to you. I realize
Gladiator is a great game and that you really want more levels...but calm
down....it's just a game.
